properties.title: Petts Wood Family Home
properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.title: Crofton Modern Flat
properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite with a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms. This apartment, being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

properties.title: Chilham Period Cottage
properties.description: Charming two bedroom period cottage nestled in a quiet village location. The property features exposed wooden beams, a cosy living room with a fireplace, a country-style kitchen, and a private cottage garden. Ideal for first-time buyers or those seeking a peaceful rural lifestyle with easy access to nearby market towns.

properties.title: Petts Wood One-Bed Flat
properties.description: A bright and modern one bedroom top-floor apartment ideally situated for local shops, restaurants and Petts Wood Station. The property features an open-plan living room with a contemporary fitted kitchen, a spacious double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a stylish bathroom. Additional benefits include gas central heating, double glazing throughout, and allocated parking. Ideal for first-time buyers or investors.

properties.title: Leeds Modern Villa
properties.description: Spacious four-bedroom villa offering generous living accommodation in a desirable residential location. The property features a large open-plan kitchen and dining area, multiple reception spaces, private garden, and secure access. Ideal for families or buyers seeking a premium home with privacy and modern design.

properties.title: Bromley Detached Family House
properties.description: A spacious four-bedroom detached family house located on a prestigious road, within close proximity to Bromley South and highly regarded schools. The property features generous living areas, including a luxury open-plan kitchen and dining room, three reception rooms, utility room, and ground-floor cloakroom. The first floor comprises four well-proportioned bedrooms, two with en-suite bathrooms, plus a family bathroom. Additional highlights include a landscaped rear garden, double garage, and off-street parking for multiple vehicles, making it ideal for families seeking comfort, space, and style.

properties.title: Wilmslow Luxury Villa
properties.description: A luxurious five-bedroom villa set in an exclusive residential area. The property boasts spacious open-plan living areas, a modern kitchen with high-end appliances, multiple private balconies, a landscaped garden, and secure parking. Ideal for families seeking upscale, private living with convenient access to local amenities and transport links.
